name: hourly_forecast
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ski_resort_forecast.
Tool description: Forecast and current snow conditions for nearly every ski resort.  Perfect spelling of resort names is NOT required in most cases.
API description: Fetches the hourly weather forecast for a specified ski resort.

resort.description: The name of the ski resort for which the forecast is to be fetched.

el.description: Specify a part of the mountain. Accepted values are 'top', 'mid', and 'bot'. Using this parameter improves response time.

units.description: Specify desired units. Accepted values are 'i' (imperial) and 'm' (metric). Using this parameter improves response time.

c.description: Limits the result to the current day only. Default is None.
